hints.content: On the number line, we start at $471$ and move **left** $\blueD{80}$, then $\greenD{2}$ more.

options.alt: A number line that has, moving left to right, tick marks labeled 389, 391, and 471. A blue arrow labeled minus 80 is above the number line beginning at 471 and ending at 391. A green arrow labeled minus 2 is above the number line beginning at 391 and ending at 389. !

choices.content: ![A number line that has, moving left to right, tick marks labeled 461, 463, and 471. A blue arrow labeled minus 8 is above the number line beginning at 471 and ending at 463. A green arrow labeled minus 2 is above the number line beginning at 463 and ending at 461.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/88495ebd15c6c410c9120aed4c1720c534275634)

![A number line that has, moving left to right, tick marks labeled 335, 337, and 417. A blue arrow labeled minus 80 is above the number line beginning at 417 and ending at 337.
